text:
Singapore: Formula 1 Grand Prix Revs UP 18 - 20 September 
Sports 
The 2015 Formula 1 Singapore Airines Singapore Grand Prix will be held 18 - 20 September on the Marina Bay Street Circuit. Closer races are expected this year because of several improvements to the circuit. Chefs at the Royal Plaza on Scotts hotel in Singapore put the finishing touches on the World's First Life-Sized Coffee Capsule Race Car. Photo Credit: Royal Plaza on Scotts. 

Closer races are expected at the Singapore Grand Prix this year because of several improvements being made along the Marina Bay Street Circuit, which are tied in with the city-state's 50th anniversary celebrations. 
The circuit will be realigned between Turns 11 and 13. A new bridge linking Merlion Park with the Esplanade prominade has also been incorporated into the circuit, offering spectactors a new vantage point. 
The Singapore Grand Prix is the world's only night race Grand Prix. It is also the only street race in Asia on the Formula One circuit. 
Several events will be held concurrently with the Singapore Grand Prix. A highlight will be a post race concert by award-winning rock band Bon Jovi on Sunday night at Padang Stage. 
Other performers performing during the Grand Prix weekend will include Pharrell Williams, Maroon 5, the Spandau Ballet, The Sam Willows, Jimmy Cliff, and Dirty Loops. 
Life Sized Coffee Capsules Race Car Chefs at the Royal Plaza on Scots enjoy a cup of coffee after assembling the world's first Life Sized Coffee Capsule Race Car. Photo Credit: Royal Plaza on Scotts. 
Hotels, restaurants, and shopping malls are offering special promotions tied in with the event. 
In what has become a tradition, Chefs at Royal Plaza on Scotts have created a life-sized race car using ingredients from the hotel's kitchen. 
This year's race car is made of coffee capsules, a world first, the hotel believes. Pasta, chocolate, bread, and macarons were used in previous years. 
Interestingly, the capsules were recycled from the hotel's 511 guest rooms and 11 meeting rooms, all of which are equipped with Nespresso machines. 
The race car will be on display until 20 September 2015. 
Splash and Dash Party Swimming pool at the W Singapore Sentosa Cove. Photo Credit: W Hotels. 
Other hotels in Singapore have other kinds of activities planned. Take W Singapore Sentosa Cove, for example. 
Not surprisingly, the hotel - which has a massive swimming pool - is planning a splash and dash party on Saturday 19 September. 
Grammy Award winning Dirty Vegas will perform at this year's one and only Formula 1 recovery pool party on the hotel's Wet Deck from 2 pm to 8 pm. Table packages are available.
